channel.title: ElevationRSPS Dupe patch

item.title: ElevationRSPS Dupe patch
item.dc:creator: @kinky_whip kinky whip
item.description:
@kinky_whip wrote:

in Walking.java find:

if(c.inTrade) { c.getTradeAndDuel().declineTrade(true); }

Replace with:

if(c.inTrade) { }

The dupe: Player A puts up items, Player A & B accept, Player B presses accept on second trade screen, Player A clicks walk on the Mini Map & it auto accepts and gives him/her the item back and Player B the item, what it does now is accepts the trade on Player Aâ€™s half.

only posting because people continue to use ElevationRSPS, I worked on ElevationRSPS before it was released and I apologize for only just posting the fix here.

Read full topic
